data.name: Broken Age - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The Broken Age Official Soundtrack features  new original music from composer Peter McConnell of Monkey Island 2, Grim Fandango, and Psychonauts fame. Recorded with the help of the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra, your ears are bound to be delighted.
